org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.activity
Interface IAeLoopControl

All Superinterfaces:
IAeBpelObject, IAeLocatableObject
All Known Implementing Classes:
AeLoopControl
public interface IAeLoopControl
extends IAeBpelObject

Tagging interface for the loop controls continue and break that is used as a param to the onContinue and onBreak methods to indicate the source of the loop control that caused the change. This is used primarily for the parallel forEach since it needs to know which child instance is continuing or breaking.
